name: Northern Tale 4
description: In Northern Tale 4, Ragnar's kingdom is in danger once again. After defeating the evil witch Gesta and the Dragon of Ether, the Viking lands are on the verge of a new invasion. Collect, repair and build to defend against a vast army of Giants, Witches and Black Knights.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: Pentium III 800MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM Storage: 750 MB available space
